passages.text: SALLOS: Hey, how are you holding up? (set: $talkedToSallos to true) [[I'm fine.->fine]] [[I'm beat!->beat]]
passages.name: Sallos

passages.text: SALLOS: Hey, what's up? Need anything? (if: $hasWood is true)[ [[Present the firewood.->giveFirewood]] ] (if: $hasTinder is true)[ [[Present the tinder.->giveTinder]] ] (if: $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is false)[ [[I forgot what I needed to do.->forgot]] ] [[I'm alright.->sallosTalkedToExit]]

links.name: I forgot what I needed to do.

passages.name: SallosTalkedTo

passages.text:
Then, he adds in a few logs at a time, and before long, the flame is roaring, and the tent is now much warmer. 

[[Continue->startCooking]]
passages.name: addWood

passages.text: SALLOS: Awh, I'm sorry to hear that! But we just have a little bit more work to do. [[Continue->work]]
passages.name: beat

passages.text:
You take a bite, and it rips and crumbles a bit, like a very greasy cake. Slimy, almost.

[[Continue->likeIt]]
passages.name: bite

passages.text:
You blush. The boy has a way with words, even in his faraway dialect of Ghuzian. You can feel the beat of your heart more now.

[[Continue->sleepSoon]]
passages.name: blush

passages.text:
You've already collect a fair amount of tinder. It'd probably be best for Sallos to take care of the firewood.
[[Continue->exitDeadTree]]
passages.name: cannotCut

passages.text:
Your hands are already full of firewood. Best to let Sallos take care of these.
[[Continue->exitGrabTinder]]
passages.name: cannotGrabTinder

passages.text:
After some effort, you manage to get together a small bundle of logs. Enough to last the night, you reckon.
[[Continue->exitDeadTree]]
(set: $hasWood to true)
passages.name: cut

passages.text:
The stove is quiet and depressing. Get it lit!

(if: $hasWood is true) [ [[Place the logs down by the stove.->placeLogs]] ]
(if: $hasKindling is true) [ [[Place the kindling down by the stove.->placeKindling]] ]

links.name: Place the logs down by the stove.
Place the kindling down by the stove.

passages.name: deadStove

passages.text:
The fallen tree collects snow. It seems to have fallen recently, judging by how little snow is atop the trunk. Did you hear it fall? The sound was probably drowned out by the wind.

(if: $logQuest is true and $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is false)[ [[Cut some logs->cut]] ]
(if: $logQuest is true and $hasWood is false and $hasTinder is true)[ [[Cut some logs->cannotCut]] ]
[[Leave->exitDeadTree]]
passages.name: deadTree

passages.text:
You close your eyes do your best to conjure up an image of the sharpest edge you can imagine in your mind. Your head begins to ache slightly, but as you open your eyes, you see that the hatchet's head has regained its sharpness, the edge gaining a shiny coating contrasting with the surrounding rust and abuse.
[[Leave->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: edgeFormed

passages.text: SALLOS: Alright! Let's get started! We've got everything we need to start cooking! [[Continue->setFire]]
passages.name: enterSallos

passages.text: SALLOS: Glad to hear it! We still have some work to do, though. [[Continue->work]]
passages.name: fine

passages.text: SALLOS: Tonight we're having... [[Continue->lightup]]
passages.name: foodTime

passages.text: SALLOS: Oh! You just need to get some firewood or tinder for me. There's a hatchet by the deadwood over there, and I think I saw good spot for foraging tinder a bit further past that. [[Thank you.->sallosTalkedToExit]]
passages.name: forgot

passages.text: SALLOS: It’s pretty funny thinking back, rescuing and then falling in love with you… and you still look exactly the same as the day we met. [[Continue->older]]
passages.name: funny

passages.text:
Upon closer inspection, most of these are soaked through. Unsuitable for kindling.
[[Continue->exitPinecones]]
passages.name: getPinecones

passages.text: SALLOS: Amazing! I already got the tinder and some kindling as well. Let's go inside the tent, and get the fire started! [[Continue->exitSallosQuest]]
passages.name: giveFirewood

passages.text: SALLOS: Amazing! I already got the firewood and some kindling as well. Let's go inside the tent, and get the fire started! [[Continue->exitSallosQuest]]
passages.name: giveTinder

passages.text:
You've gathered some tinder.
(set: $hasTinder to true)
[[Continue->exitGrabTinder]]
passages.name: grabTinder

passages.text: SALLOS: Man, I really wish I could get a few more inches. It’s terrible how every other Ifni gets to be tall and strong, while I’m stuck down here. However— [[Continue->pinch]]
passages.name: grow

passages.text:
The hatchet sits in on the ground quietly, resting after its long day of work.
(if: $sharpendHatchet is false) [ [[Take a closer look->hatchetLookCloser]] ]
(if: $sharpendHatchet is true ) [ [[Take a closer look->sharpHatchetLookCloser]] ]
[[Leave->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: hatchet

passages.text:
You pick it up, and take a closer look at the head. It's been worn down after years of use. It's edge is chipped, and rust dots the surface. You could try to use some of your magic to reshape and restore it.
[[Sharpen the hatchet->sharpen]]
passages.name: hatchetLookCloser

passages.text: SALLOS: It puts me at just the right height to look at you. Even if I can’t live as long as you, I’m happy that I can see you at the same level as me. [[Continue->blush]]
passages.name: height

passages.text: SALLOS: It's... [[Continue->pemmican]]
passages.name: itIs

passages.text: SALLOS: Well, get used to it then, it’s what we’ll be eating till we get to the top. I’m saving the best stuff for once we get up there. [[Continue->makeHoosh]]
passages.name: itsBad

passages.text: SALLOS:I guess that’s a successful experiment! I’m really happy that you like it! [[Continue->makeHoosh]]
passages.name: itsGood

passages.text: SALLOS: Whatever suits your tastes. [[Continue->look]]
passages.name: justWater

passages.text:
Your eyes light up, and your stomach growls loudly.

[[What is it?->whatIs]]
passages.name: lightup

passages.text: SALLOS: Like it? I tried to make yours as tasty as possible without using meat stuff. How’d I do? [[It is good!->itsGood]] [[It is bad!->itsBad]]
passages.name: likeIt

passages.text:
Sallos looks listfully at you, and you, back at him. 

[[Continue->reminds]]
passages.name: look

passages.text: SALLOS: If you’d like, you can also put your pemmican in the water to make some hoosh. I’ve still got some biscuits for that as well. [[I am alright, water is just fine.->justWater]] [[Sure!->makeIt]]

links.name: I am alright, water is just fine.

passages.name: makeHoosh

passages.text:
You drop the rest of your pemmican in the water, and Sallos puts in a biscuit. It slowly disintegrates, turning the water into a thin soup, the vegetables floating around lazily as they detach from the body of the block. 

[[Continue->look]]
passages.name: makeIt

passages.text:
He, however, doesn’t. In the years since you first met him, he’s gotten older, lost some of the roundness in his face and gained a few marks and nicks. Proof that he’s been alive, he’s always said. That being said, he’s not grown taller by much.

[[I've changed my hair! And what about you? You've not grown an inch, either! Watch out, or soon enough, I'll be taller than you!->sigh]]

links.name: I've changed my hair! And what about you? You've not grown an inch, either! Watch out, or soon enough, I'll be taller than you!

passages.name: older

passages.text: SALLOS: Just some pemmican. I’ve got meat in mine, so be careful which one you eat. Here, take it. [[Take it.->takeIt]]
passages.name: pemmican

passages.text:
He reaches over to you and pinches your cheek.

[[Continue->height]]
passages.name: pinch

passages.text:
Sallos did say that pine cones are good for kindling, right?

(if: $tinderQuest is true)[ [[Gather a few->getPinecones]] ]
[[Continue->exitNoGrabPinecones]]
passages.name: pinecones

passages.text:
You place the bundle of sticks by the stove.
(set: $sallosWalkIn to true)

[[Continue->exitPlaceStove]]
passages.name: placeKindling

passages.text:
You place the bundle of sticks by the stove.
(set: $sallosWalkIn to true)

[[Continue->exitPlaceStove]]
passages.name: placeLogs

passages.text: SALLOS: You know, eating like this reminds me a lot of when we first met all those years ago. We ate a meal just like this. Except it was just biscuits and water for you. Didn’t have the veggies back then! [[That really was awful… But you did save my life out there. And we met.->funny]]

links.name: That really was awful… But you did save my life out there. And we met.

passages.name: reminds

passages.text:
Your legs are burning, and your breathing is labored. But you and Sallos have finished pitching the tent.

[[Finally, we're done! The tent is all set up! I need a break!->wear]]

links.name: Finally, we're done! The tent is all set up! I need a break!

passages.name: scene

passages.text:
Sallos puts the sticks into the stove, and begins striking an iron rod to get a spark. After a few attempts, the kindling catches, and the tent lights up. The embers in the stove make a light crackle as they smoulder, giving off the barest of light and warmth.
[[Continue->addWood]]
passages.name: setFire

passages.text:
Thanks to your efforts, the hatchet has been sharpened to a razor's edge.
[[Leave->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: sharpHatchetLookCloser

passages.text:
You focus your mana, and touch the blade. You feel as is a wind is blowing across your arm, and the axe head begins to glow blue, and it begins to deform and almost melt.
(set: $strength += 1)
(set: $sharpenedHatchet to true)
[[Continue->edgeFormed]]
passages.name: sharpen

passages.text:
He lets out an exasperated sigh.

[[Continue->grow]]
passages.name: sigh

passages.text:
SALLOS: Anyways, we should probably finish up soon. We should catch some rest as soon as possible. I want to catch the sunrise at the peak.

[[Leave->exitSleep]]
passages.name: sleepSoon

passages.text: SALLOS: Now that that's settled, let's get cooking! (blackout->freeroam) [[Continue->exitPot]]
passages.name: startCooking

passages.text:
The bar is waxy, and looks like a brick made of peas and dirt. Not very appetizing, however edible it is.

[[Take a bite->bite]]
passages.name: takeIt

passages.text:
Ther is a pile of pine branches and needles on the ground before you.
(if: $tinderQuest is true and $hasTinder is false and $hasWood is false)[ [[Forage for tinder->grabTinder]] ]
(if: $tinderQuest is true and $hasTinder is false and $hasWood is true)[ [[Forage for tinder->cannotGrabTinder]] ]
[[Continue->exitTinder]]
passages.name: tinder

passages.text:
Sallos doesn’t look any worse for wear, despite him outpacing you the whole trek up, and doing most of the heavy lifting setting up the tent.

[[Continue->exitScene]]
passages.name: wear

passages.text: EULYSS: What is it? [[Continue->itIs]]
passages.name: whatIs

passages.text: SALLOS: There's a few dead trees around here. You should help me cut some firewood. Or you can go look for tinder—pine needles or anything else that's tiny and dry will work. [[Continue->exitQuestGive]]
passages.name: work

passages.text:
Sallos sits by the pot, watching the water slowly come to a boil.
[["What're you making?"]]
passages.name: sallosDiscussion

passages.text: SALLOS: I'm putting together a stew with some stock cubes I brought along with me—there's no meat in here, don't worry. [[Continue->parchment]]
passages.name: "What're you making?"

passages.text:
He pulls out a handful of parchment wrapped cubes, tied with a piece of string.
[[Continue->help]]
passages.name: parchment

passages.text: SALLOS: I could use some help unpacking these cubes though, if you'd like to help. [[Sure!->agreeToHelp]] [[I think I'll keep looking around a bit first.->exitHelp]]

links.name: I think I'll keep looking around a bit first.

passages.name: help

passages.text: SALLOS:
passages.name: agreeToHelp

passages.text: SALLOS: Would you like to help? [[Just a minute.->exitHelp]]
passages.name: sallosDiscussionRepeat

passages.text:
The hatchet sits in on the ground quietly, resting after its long day of work, it's blade freshly sharpened.
[[Leave->exitHatchet]]
passages.name: hatchetSharpened
